title: FSX PMDG 777 1.10.6492 cracked
description:
Instructions
1. Disconnect from Internet
2. Install Base Aircraft and Expansions
3. Add the following line to your "hosts" file c:WindowsSystem32Driversetchosts

(more info http://helpdeskgeek.com/windows-7/windows-7-hosts-file/)

127.0.0.1 precisionmanuals.com
127.0.0.1 www.precisionmanuals.com
127.0.0.1 license.precisionmanuals.com

4. Add crack to "FSXRootgauges" directory, overwrite file

5. Ensure you have SimConnect Installed (check in 'P3DRoot
edistInterface' directory)

6. Block "C/Program Files (x86)/Common Files/Macrovision Shared/FLEXnet Publisher/FNPLicensingService.exe", in your firewall.

7. Block "fsx.exe" in your firewall

8. Re-Connect to the internet, and install your choice of liveries in OpsCenter

9. Start FSX FSX-SE and Enjoy
